page.syntax: HTML_Text as C = *BIN_TO_HTML(B data[,flags as c])

argument.name: HTML_Text
argument.description: Formatted HTML text that corresponds to the original formatted RTF text.

argument.name: data
argument.description: The contents of a RTF memo field.

page.discussion: The *BIN_TO_HTML() function converts binary RTF text to HTML text. The following images show the RTF text on the form and the converted HTML text in a browser.

section.title: Example
section.description: The following example reads RTF binary text, writes it to an HTML file, and displays it in a browser.
section.example: dim tbl as P dim htmltext as C tbl = table.open("customer") tbl.fetch_first() htmltext = " " + *bin_to_html(tbl.rtfmemo) + " " file.from_string("c:\foo.html",htmltext) sys_open("c:\foo.html")

section.description: This example retrieves the HTML value of a form's commentfield, which is a RTF memo field.
section.example: dim tbl as P dim fld as P dim html as C tbl = table.current() fld = tbl.field_get("comment") html = *bin_to_html(fld.value_get() )
